subproject.description:
The project will address the capacity needs and contribute to the re-development of the Metrological  Directorate The overall objective is to reduce vulnerability of the population of Sierra Leone to existing weather and climate hazards and increase resilience to future climate change. Technical advice and support will be provided by the World Metrological Office. 

The project will support the formulation of a comprehensive national land policy.  The policy reform process is as inclusive as possible to enable all views to be considered by the drafting team.
subproject.title: ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION FOR PEA

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development

title: CAPACITY BUILDING OF METREOLOGICAL OFFICE & REFORM OF LA
